app.arkNote: Holdings are fetched from ARK's published daily ARKK holdings file.
app.pelosiDisclaimer: These are NOT official real-time holdings. We infer a rough net notional exposure from disclosed transaction amount ranges.
app.pelosiLogic: For each disclosed trade, we convert the USD amount range into a midpoint (e.g. 250,001–500,000 -> 375,000; Over X -> 1.25×X). Purchases add notional (+), sales subtract (-). We then aggregate by ticker. Options are treated as notional exposure only.
